short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for finding answers to your customers questions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
https://qanswerer.conovaloff.com/

QAnswerer- helps to find a template answer to a client's question

How does it work?: - This is a browser plugin that you tell where on the page the question is located, and it finds the most appropriate answer from those that you have already used

Is it difficult?: - Easy! You don't need anything other than our plugin and a little tweaking. If something goes wrong, we have a community where you can help.
